name: Knative Kn Plugin Event release v1.9.1
body:
## Changes by Kind

### Bug or Regression

- :bug: Sending an event with ID validating RFC 1123 using in-cluster sender no longer results in failure
  :bug: Error will no longer display usage (#240, @cardil)
- :bug: Sending event using in-cluster sender no longer display a Warn about propagation policy (#241, @cardil)

## Dependencies

### Added
- filippo.io/edwards25519: v1.0.0-rc.1
- github.com/DATA-DOG/go-sqlmock: [v1.5.0](https://github.com/DATA-DOG/go-sqlmock/tree/v1.5.0)
